Description:
The FHIR DeviceUseStatement resource records the use of a healthcare-related device by a patient. This resource supports statements for both implantable and external medical devices. Any elements marked with an * in their description are returned for both implants and external devices, and all others are returned for implants only.

Read interactions begin with a client having previously established a relationship, typically when following a reference to this resource from another resource or through querying for device use statements through the search interaction.

bodySite.Name: bodySite
bodySite.Description: The location of an implant in the body.

Laterality.Name: extension
Laterality.Description: Laterality adds information about body side to the anatomic location, for example left.

device.Name: device
device.Description: Reference to the Device (Implants) or Device (External Device) resource.*

HealthcareProvider.Name: extension
HealthcareProvider.Description: Returns the organization where the device was implanted.

HealthProfessional.Name: extension
HealthProfessional.Description: Returns the practitioner who implanted the device.

profile.Name: profile
profile.Description: *Available in Netherlands environments only. This environment shows that this API conforms to the profile connected to the following canonical url: http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-MedicalDevice

status.Name: status
status.Description:
One of the following values:

  • active
  • completed
  • intended
  • stopped

    • *For external devices, this is hard coded to a value of active.

whenUsed.Name: whenUsed
whenUsed.Description: The date of the implant and explant for a device.
